languages.text: {n}Каллигос улыбается хищно и весело.{/n} "В качестве благодарности можешь вернуть мне кое-что мое, осевшее в твоих карманах. Станция {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} — не слыхал{mf||а} про нее? Я просил лишь помочь этому хитрому слизняку Владайму справиться с угрозой голода, а не брать мою собственность под свое {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}покровительство{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Каллигос улыбается хищно и весело.{/n} "В качестве благодарности можешь вернуть мне кое-что мое, осевшее в твоих карманах. Станция Футфол — не слыхал{mf||а} про нее? Я просил лишь помочь этому хитрому слизняку Владайму справиться с угрозой голода, а не брать мою собственность под свое покровительство".

languages.text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine that has found its way into your pockets. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} Station — sounds familiar? All I asked you to do was help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}claim{/d} my property for yourself."
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос улыбается хищно и весело.{/n} "В качестве благодарности можешь вернуть мне кое-что мое, осевшее в твоих карманах. Станция {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} — не слыхал{mf||а} про нее? Я просил лишь помочь этому хитрому слизняку Владайму справиться с угрозой голода, а не брать мою собственность под свое {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}покровительство{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and predatory smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine which has found its way into your pockets. The Footfall station — sounds familiar? All I asked was to help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not to claim my property for yourself."

{n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and predatory smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine which has found its way into your pockets. The Footfall station — sounds familiar? All I asked was to help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not to claim my property for yourself."

All I asked you to do was help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not claim my property for yourself."

{n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and predatory smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine that has found its way into your pockets. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} Station — sounds familiar? All I asked you to do was help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not claim my property for yourself."

{n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine that has found its way into your pockets. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} Station — sounds familiar? All I asked you to do was help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not claim my property for yourself."

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは上機嫌に、どことなく凶暴な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「感謝してるというならその証に、お前のポケットに入っている俺の落とし物を返してくれないか。{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}・ステーションだ。聞き覚えがあるだろう？俺は怠け者で悪知恵持ちのヴラダイムに飢饉の脅威の対処を手伝ってくれって言っただけで、俺の財産を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}持って行っていい{/d}とは言っていない」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine that has found its way into your pockets. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} Station — sounds familiar? All I asked you to do was help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}claim{/d} my property for yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは上機嫌に、どことなく凶暴な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「感謝してるというならその証に、お前のポケットに入っている俺の落とし物を返してくれないか。{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}・ステーションだ。聞き覚えがあるだろう？俺は怠け者で悪知恵持ちのヴラダイムに飢饉の脅威の対処を手伝ってくれって言っただけで、俺の財産を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}持って行っていい{/d}とは言っていない」

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯露出了愉悦而野性的笑容。{/n}“那么，为了表达你的感激之情，为什么不把你不问自取的东西还给我呢？{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}这个名字，你应该不陌生吧？我只是请你帮助那个狡猾的弗拉迪姆解决饥荒的问题，没让你把我的财产{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}据为己有{/d}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine that has found its way into your pockets. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} Station — sounds familiar? All I asked you to do was help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}claim{/d} my property for yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯报以掠食者般的愉快笑容。{/n}“那么，为了表达你的感激之情，为什么不把你不问自取的东西还给我呢？{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}这个名字，你应该不陌生吧？我只是请你帮助那个狡猾的弗拉迪姆解决饥荒的问题，没让你把我的财产据为己有。”

languages.text: {n}Calligos te lanza una mirada alegre y un tanto salvaje.{/n} «Como muestra de gratitud, ¿le importaría devolverme algo mío que ha acabado en sus manos? Es la estación de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, igual le suena el nombre. Solo le pedí que ayudara a esa babosa artera de Vladaym a resolver el problema del hambre, no que me {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}arrebatara{/d} mi propiedad».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine that has found its way into your pockets. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} Station — sounds familiar? All I asked you to do was help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}claim{/d} my property for yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos te lanza una mirada alegre y depredadora.{/n} «Como muestra de gratitud, ¿le importaría devolverme algo mío que ha acabado en sus manos? Es la estación de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, igual le suena el nombre. Solo le pedí que ayudara a esa babosa artera de Vladaym a resolver el problema del hambre, no que me arrebatara mi propiedad».

languages.text: {n}Calligos vous adresse un sourire aussi joyeux que farouche.{/n} « En gage de votre gratitude, vous pourriez me rendre quelque chose qui s'est frayé un chemin jusque dans vos poches. La station de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, ça vous dit quelque chose ? Tout ce que je vous avais demandé, c'était d'aider ce vermisseau de Vladaym à régler le problème de famine, pas de vous {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}emparer{/d} de ma propriété. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine that has found its way into your pockets. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} Station — sounds familiar? All I asked you to do was help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}claim{/d} my property for yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos vous adresse un sourire qui, vous ne savez comment, paraît aussi joyeux que carnassier.{/n} « En gage de votre gratitude, vous pourriez me rendre quelque chose qui s'est frayé un chemin jusque dans vos poches. La station {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, ça vous dit quelque chose ? Tout ce que je vous avais demandé, c'était d'aider ce vermisseau de Vladaym à régler le problème de famine, pas de vous emparer de ma propriété. »

languages.text: {n}Calligos schenkt dir ein gleichermaßen freundliches wie düsteres Lächeln.{/n} "Als Zeichen Eurer Dankbarkeit könntet Ihr etwas zurückgeben, das mir gehört und den Weg in Eure Taschen gefunden hat. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}-Station – schon mal gehört? Ihr solltet nur diesem raffinierten Vladaym bei der Bedrohung durch die Hungersnot helfen, nicht meinen Besitz für Euch selbst {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}beanspruchen{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine that has found its way into your pockets. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} Station — sounds familiar? All I asked you to do was help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}claim{/d} my property for yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos lächelt freundlich und gleichzeitig raubtierhaft.{/n} "Als Zeichen Eurer Dankbarkeit könntet Ihr etwas zurückgeben, das mir gehört und den Weg in Eure Taschen gefunden hat. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}-Station – schon mal gehört? Ihr solltet nur diesem raffinierten Vladaym bei der Bedrohung durch die Hungersnot helfen, nicht meinen Besitz für Euch selbst beanspruchen."

{n}Calligos schenkt dir ein gleichermaßen freundliches wie düsteres Lächeln.{/n} "Als Zeichen Eurer Dankbarkeit könntet Ihr etwas zurückgeben, das mir gehört und den Weg in Eure Taschen gefunden hat. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}-Station – schon mal gehört? Ihr solltet nur diesem raffinierten Vladaym bei der Bedrohung durch die Hungersnot helfen, nicht meinen Besitz für Euch selbst beanspruchen."

languages.text: {n}Calligos sana neşeli, biraz da vahşi bir gülümsemeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Minnettarlığının bir göstergesi olarak cebine attığın bir şeyi geri verebilirsin. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} İstasyonu adı tanıdık geliyor mu? Senden o kurnaz sümüklü böcek Vladaym'ın kıtlık tehdidiyle başa çıkmasına yardım etmeni istemiştim, mülkümü {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}üstüne almanı{/d} değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos gives you a cheerful and somewhat feral smile.{/n} "As a sign of your gratitude, you could return something of mine that has found its way into your pockets. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} Station — sounds familiar? All I asked you to do was help that crafty slug Vladaym deal with the threat of famine, not {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}claim{/d} my property for yourself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos sana neşeli ve biraz vahşi bir gülümsemeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Minnettarlığının bir göstergesi olarak cebine attığın bir şeyi geri verebilirsin. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} İstasyonu adı tanıdık geliyor mu? Senden tek istediğim, o kurnaz sümüklü böcek Vladaym'ın kıtlık tehdidiyle başa çıkmasına yardım etmendi, mülkümü üstüne alman değil."
